mdRecord.dcterms:title: Community Center, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: View from Community Center portico toward the foundry

"To provide a community center for the homesteaders, the government bought a historic Presbyterian church from the Reedsville-Masontown area, disassembled it, and put it back together in Arthurdale...a portico with gable roof was added when the church was reconstructed in 1933-34." -- Arthurdale National Register of Historic Places Registration Form [work]
